name: Bingo Jogatina HD
description:
The BEST FREE Bingo app is now available on your iPad!

1,5 MILLION people already tested and aproved this game. They are now playing on mobile devices and computers all around the world!

Download Bingo Jogatina and win an exclusive Super Bonus!!

*****

- Play Online Bingo on your iPad
- Receive a free BONUS of chips every day.
- EVERYBODY WINS: each round you will earn experience points, coins and bingo chips!
- Enjoy the best POWER-UPS, perfectly designed
- Earn experience points to unlock NEW ROOMS
- Discover the world with our thematic ROOMS: Rio de Janeiro, São Paulo, Paris, Rome, etc.
- 13 WINNING patterns: you will always win
- Be part of the Daily TOP 10 if you can!

*****

Download FREE Bingo Jogatina now!

Discover more games: Briscola Jogatina, Solitaire Jogatina and Tic Tac Toe Jogatina!
